content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although our fictional character persona doesn't apply here personally, as Peter Schmidt I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg. To begin negotiations, let me propose an initially high price for the rent, say 1500 Euros per month. Now it's your turn to counter-offer with a lower figure if needed. We aim to find a mutually agreeable rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your proposal is too high for me. I offer 800 Euro for the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectation for this prime location in the city center is significantly higher than your offered price of 800 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, let's negotiate a bit. How about 1200 Euro? It's a good middle ground.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While still not meeting my initial expectations, I recognize your effort to find common ground. I agree to the price of 1200 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
